Testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
Testimonials.description: Real feedback from real people. See why families trust us with their moves.

items.text: The team was incredible. They treated our belongings like their own and made our Melbourne to Sydney move completely stress-free. Can't recommend them enough!
items.author: Sarah Johnson

items.text: Professional, friendly, and efficient. The quote was transparent, no hidden costs, and they delivered exactly what they promised. Best moving company we've used.
items.author: Michael Chen

items.text: They handled our office move with such professionalism. Minimal downtime, everything arrived perfectly, and the team was just wonderful to work with.
items.author: Emma Parker

FAQ.title: Your Questions Answered
FAQ.description: Have questions? We have answers. Can't find what you're looking for? Give us a call.

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking 2-4 weeks in advance for interstate moves, especially during peak season (summer and end of month). However, we can often accommodate last-minute moves—just give us a call!

items.question: What insurance do you provide?
items.answer: All our moves include comprehensive Transit and Public Liability insurance. Basic coverage is included in every package, with options for additional coverage for high-value items. We're fully licensed and insured for your peace of mind.

items.question: Can I track my belongings?
items.answer: Yes! All interstate moves include GPS tracking. You'll receive real-time updates on your shipment's location and estimated arrival time. Our team is also available by phone for updates anytime.

items.question: What can't you move?
items.answer: For safety and legal reasons, we cannot transport hazardous materials, perishable foods, plants (interstate), pets, or illegal items. We're happy to advise on alternatives for plants and pets if needed.

items.question: What are your payment terms?
items.answer: We require a 25% deposit to secure your booking, with the balance due upon completion. We accept all major credit cards, bank transfers, and cash. Payment plans available for larger moves.

CTA.title: Ready to Make Your Move?

house.title: House Moving
house.subtitle: Complete residential moving services
house.description: Our house moving services are designed to make your residential relocation stress-free. Whether you're moving to a new apartment, townhouse, or family home, our experienced team handles everything with care and professionalism. From packing to unpacking, we ensure your belongings arrive safely at your new home.
benefits: Peace of mind with insured moves

commercial.title: Commercial Moving
commercial.subtitle: Efficient business relocations
commercial.description: We understand that time is money in business. Our commercial moving services are designed to minimize downtime and keep your operations running smoothly. From small offices to large warehouses, we handle business relocations of all sizes with efficiency and professionalism.
features: Flexible scheduling to suit your needs

office.title: Office Relocation
office.subtitle: Specialized office moving services
office.description: Office relocations require careful planning and execution. Our specialized office moving services ensure your workspace is relocated efficiently with minimal disruption to your business. We handle everything from workstations to IT equipment, ensuring a smooth transition to your new office space.

packing.title: Professional Packing
packing.subtitle: Expert packing for maximum protection
packing.description: Our professional packing services use premium materials and specialized techniques to ensure every item is perfectly protected. From delicate glassware to valuable artwork, our experienced packers handle your belongings with the utmost care. We offer full packing, partial packing, or materials-only options.

storage.title: Storage
storage.subtitle: Secure storage solutions
storage.description: Need extra space during your move? Our secure storage facilities provide flexible short and long-term solutions for your belongings. With 24/7 security monitoring and climate control, your items are protected in our modern, clean facilities. We offer convenient access and flexible terms to suit your needs.
benefits: Peace of mind with secure storage

furniture.title: New Furniture Delivery
furniture.subtitle: Professional furniture delivery and assembly
furniture.description: Purchased new furniture? Let our professional team handle the delivery and assembly. We ensure your new furniture arrives in perfect condition and is assembled correctly in your home. Our experienced crews handle everything from small items to large furniture pieces with care and expertise.
